DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is: - To define The differences of bio-chemical phenotypes in chronic airway inflammatory diseases. - To identify novel biomarkers in chronic airway inflammatory diseases as a screening, diagnostic, or monitoring marker.
DOC.brief_title: Novel Biomarkers in Chronic Airway Diseases
DOC.criteria: > 18 years olds Both sexes Asthma or COPD was diagnosed according to the criteria of the American Thoracic Society, GINA, GOLD guideline Acute exacerbation was defined by the criteria of the American Thoracic Society, GINA, GOLD guideline For stable disease, none of the subjects had received inhaled or oral corticosteroids or any other antiinflammatory drugs, had an exacerbation history in the previous 6 months
